Package controller

Class BookingController

java.lang.Object
controller.BookingController
public class BookingController extends Object
Controller for movie booking functionality and store all bookings, each booking controller is owned my one MovieGoer object
Since:
2022-11-13
Version:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • save

      public void save()

    • getBookings

      public ArrayList<Booking> getBookings()
      Get list of all bookings made by this movieGoerId user
      Returns:
      Arraylist of all bookings for this user

    • calculatePrice

      public static float calculatePrice(Cinema c, Showtime s, int seatsCount, int movieGoerId, boolean disc)
      Display price calculation process and calculate price for a particular booking
      Parameters:
      c - Cinema where the MovieGoer by ticket from
      s - Showtime that contains date of showing of the movie
      seatsCount - Number of seats booked in this particular showtime
      movieGoerId - ID of movieGoer who booked the ticket
      disc - Discount applied or not, has a value of true or false
      Returns:
      Final Price for this ticket booking

    • isAfternoonShowtime

      private static boolean isAfternoonShowtime(Date date)
      Indicate whether a showtime is considered afternoon showtime or not
      Parameters:
      date - Date and Time object of the showtime booking
      Returns:
      True if the showtime that starts before 8am-6pm (exclusive 6pm), otherwise false

    • isMidnightShowtime

      private static boolean isMidnightShowtime(Date d)
      Indicate whether a showtime is considered midnight showtime or not
      Parameters:
      d - Date and Time object of the showtime booking
      Returns:
      True if the showtime that starts at 6pm onwards, otherwise false

    • compareTimes

      public static boolean compareTimes(Date d1, Date d2)
      Utility function to compare the time of two date objects, ignoring the date part itself
      Parameters:
      d1 - First date object
      d2 - Second date object
      Returns:
      True if time of d2 is after time of d1, else false
